name: A Dicey Situation
description:
This is a endless runner game where the goal is to score as many points as possible, you are equipped with a chip gun, you will use it to battle flying poker chips and walking playing cards. But every 10 seconds a dice rolls and you receive a buff or a debuff depending on what it rolls, also every wave a health boost spawns.

Buffs:

Speed boost - 2

More Bullets - 3

Jump Boost - 5

Triple Jump - 6

Debuffs:

Less health - 1

Decreased speed - 3

also the only asset used for this was sfxr for sound effects.
